subscription.yearlyDescription: Best price - pay once a year
subscription.trialDescription: The trial period lasts 7 days and will end on {date}

freeAccountCard.title: Free account
freeAccountCard.subtitle: Free account active
freeAccountCard.description: You have access to all features without any fees

chooseSubscriptionDialog.title: Select subscription
chooseSubscriptionDialog.description: Your trial period has ended or you don't have an active subscription. Select the subscription that best suits your needs.

Failed to create subscription portal session, please try again later.

structure.financialCushionDetailedInfo: Financial cushion, in this category should be placed assets that are easily liquidated, such as cash, savings, and investments.
structure.livingAssetsDetailedInfo: Living assets, in this category should be placed assets that are used for daily life, such as a house or a car.
structure.investmentAssetsDetailedInfo: Investment assets, in this category should be placed assets that are invested for a longer period of time, such as stocks or bonds.
structure.otherAssetsDetailedInfo: Other assets, in this category should be placed assets that do not fit into other categories, such as collectibles or jewelry.

noAssetsCard.title: You don't have any assets yet
noAssetsCard.description: Add assets to control your fortune.

addAsset.title: Add asset
addAsset.description: Add an asset to your list of assets.

editAsset.title: Edit asset
editAsset.description: Edit an asset from your list of assets.

deleteAsset.title: Delete asset
deleteAsset.description: If you added an asset by mistake and want to delete it together with the history, so that no traces are left in it -
deleteAsset.totalDeleteDescription: If you want to delete the asset completely, it may affect your account history. If you simply reduced it to zero, use the regular delete option.

noDebtsCard.title: You don't have any debts yet
noDebtsCard.description: Add debts to control your fortune.

addDebt.title: Add debt
addDebt.description: Add a debt to your list of debts.

editDebt.title: Edit debt
editDebt.description: Edit a debt from your list of debts.

deleteDebt.title: Delete debt
deleteDebt.description: If you added a debt by mistake and want to delete it together with the history, so that no traces are left in it -
deleteDebt.totalDeleteDescription: If you want to delete the debt completely, it may affect your account history. If you simply reduced it to zero, use the regular delete option.

noGoalsCard.title: You don't have any goals yet
noGoalsCard.description: Add a goal to your list of goals, to track your financial goals.

scheduleDialog.title: Deposit schedule - {goalName}
scheduleDialog.description: Here is the deposit schedule on the goal.

addGoal.title: Add new goal
addGoal.description: Add a new goal to your list of goals.

dateField.label: Planned end date
dateField.errorMustBeInTheFuture: Date must be in the future.

editGoal.title: Edit goal
editGoal.description: Edit a goal from your list of goals.

deleteGoal.title: Delete goal
deleteGoal.description: Delete a goal from your list of goals. All the outcomes will be removed from previous budget periods, so it may affect your account history. If you don't want to affect history finish the goal instead, then only the future outcomes will be removed.

finishGoal.title: Finish goal
finishGoal.description: Finish a goal from your list of goals.

goalsSummaryCard.title: Goals
goalsSummaryCard.noGoals: You don't have any goals yet

financialCushion.title: Financial cushion
financialCushion.description1: Financial cushion should be 3-6 months of your monthly expenses to ensure financial security in case of unexpected situations. You currently have
financialCushion.description3: of the recommended value. We recommend a cushion of 6 times your monthly expenses.

budgetSummary.listOfPouches: Total amount of pouches in the budget period.

removePouchOutcome.title: Remove expense from pouch
removePouchOutcome.description: Are you sure you want to remove this expense from pouch? This operation cannot be undone.

removePouch.title: Remove pouch
removePouch.descriptionOneTime: Are you sure you want to remove this pouch? This operation cannot be undone.
removePouch.descriptionMultiple: Are you sure you want to remove this pouch? This operation cannot be undone, and it may affect your account history, such as changing the balance of the current or past budget.

addPouchOutcome.title: Add expense to pouch
addPouchOutcome.description: Select pouch and add expense within it, to control your budget, track your assets and achieve your financial goals.

editPouchOutcome.title: Edit expense from pouch
editPouchOutcome.description: Edit expense from pouch, to control your budget, track your assets and achieve your financial goals.

addPouch.title: Create new pouch
addPouch.description: Add pouches to control your budget, track your assets and achieve your financial goals.

editPouch.title: Edit pouch
editPouch.description: Unfortunately, due to the correctness of the history of your pouches, not all fields can be changed. To fully edit the pouch, use the pause pouch or delete pouch options, and then create a new one.

stopPouch.title: Stop pouch
stopPouch.descriptionAttentionStop: Stopping the pouch, it will not be included in the budget from the date you provide.
stopPouch.descriptionAttentionStopPouch: Stopping the pouch, it will not be included in the budget from the date you provide.
stopPouch.descriptionDeleteTitle: If you want to completely delete the pouch,
stopPouch.descriptionDeleteAttention: Remember, completely deleting the pouch may cause changes in the balances of the current and past budgets.

tour.title: Welcome to the application
tour.description: This is a guide to the application. It will help you understand the application and start using it. You can skip it now, and start at any time from the settings screen.

addFamily.title: Add your family
addFamily.description: The first step is to add a family, this is a profile that will be shared with other users and will allow for joint management of finances. To control the tour use the buttons below or the arrows on the keyboard.
addFamily.alert: You must add at least one family, to continue

families.title: Family card
families.description: This is your family card, it contains information about the family and the ability to manage it. You can be a member of several families at the same time, to switch between them use the button in the upper right corner of the card, it is not visible on this card because it is currently selected.

familyEdit.title: Family edit
familyEdit.description: This button will allow you to open the family edit panel, in which you can change the family name, time zone and currency.

familyDelete.title: Family delete
familyDelete.description: This button will allow you to delete the family, in order to do this, you need to click on the delete family button and confirm it in the dialog window.

inviteUserToFamily.title: Invite user to family
inviteUserToFamily.description: This button will allow you to invite a user to the family, in order to do this, you need to click on the invite user button and enter the user's email.

yourFamilyInvitations.title: Sent invitations
yourFamilyInvitations.description: Here you will see the invitations to the family sent by you

familyInvitations.title: Received invitations
familyInvitations.description: Here you will see the invitations to the family sent by other users

goToBudgetPage.title: Go to budget page
goToBudgetPage.description: To discover the next features of the application, go to the budget page.

budgetSettings.title: Budget settings
budgetSettings.description: This button opens the budget management settings window, you can set the start day of the new budget and how often the new budget should start, there is also an option to transfer the balance of pouches to the next budgets, you can learn more about it by clicking on the "i" icon next to the field to select this option.

budgetItems.title: Go to budget items page
budgetItems.description: To configure your expenses and incomes, go to the budget items page.

addIncome.title: Add new income
addIncome.description: Add your first income, select whether it is one-time or recurring and enter its amount
addIncome.alert: You must add at least one income, to continue

seeThisIncome.title: Income card
seeThisIncome.description: This is the income card, it contains information about the income, its amount, whether it is one-time or recurring, there are also options for editing and deleting, be careful with deleting recurring incomes, it may affect previous budgets, so when a recurring income stops, simply stop it so that the history of your budgets is not changed.

addOutcome.title: Add new expense
addOutcome.description: Add your first expense, select whether it is one-time or recurring and enter its amount
addOutcome.alert: You must add at least one expense, to continue

seeThisOutcome.title: Expense card
seeThisOutcome.description: This is the expense card, it contains information about the expense, its amount, whether it is one-time or recurring, there are also options for editing and deleting, be careful with deleting recurring expenses, it may affect previous budgets, so when a recurring expense stops, simply stop it so that the history of your budgets is not changed.

addPouch.title: Add new pouch
addPouch.description: Add your first pouch, pouches are a special type of expense, which can be used to control the budget, allows you to select the amount you want to allocate to a specific purpose, for example food, and then during the budget period add individual expenses within this pouch, so that you can exactly know how much money we spent on a specific purpose during the budget period. If you have selected the option of transferring pouch balances, then if you do not spend all the money in this period, the remaining amount will be transferred to the next one, similarly when you spend more money than allocated in a given period, the remaining amount will be transferred to the next period.
addPouch.alert: You must add at least one pouch, to continue

seeThisPouch.title: Pouch card
seeThisPouch.description: This is the pouch card, it contains information about the pouch, its amount, whether it is one-time or recurring, there are also options for editing and deleting, be careful with deleting recurring pouches, it may affect previous budgets, so when a recurring pouch stops, simply stop it so that the history of your budgets is not changed.

goToBudgetSummary.title: Go to budget summary
goToBudgetSummary.description: Go to budget summary, you will see there the current budget period based on the data you have added in this period

seeBudgetTimeline.title: See budget timeline
seeBudgetTimeline.description: Here you can see from when to when the current budget period is

seeBudgetBalance.title: See budget balance
seeBudgetBalance.description: This card shows your balance in the current budget period, you can compare how much you have in income and expenses in this period, calculating with the expenses you have made in pouches, but also balance calculating with all planned expenses and incomes

budgetPouches.title: Pouch summary
budgetPouches.description: This card shows the summary of all pouches, you can see how much was spent in this period, and how much expenses in pouches are planned in this budget period.

pouchOutcome.title: Pouch card
pouchOutcome.description: As I mentioned earlier, pouches are a special type of container for expenses, a pouch has its own capacity. Thanks to this button, you can add an expense in the pouch, add it now, then you can delete it.
pouchOutcome.alert: You must add at least one expense in the pouch, to continue

pouchOutcomesList.title: Pouch expenses list
pouchOutcomesList.description: You can view the expenses in the pouch here in the form of a list, click on this list to see which expenses were added in this pouch.
pouchOutcomesList.alert: You must expand the list of expenses in the pouch, to continue

pouchOutcomeEdit.title: Pouch expenses management
pouchOutcomeEdit.description: Each expense can be edited and deleted, to do this use the highlighted buttons.

incomesList.title: Incomes list
incomesList.description: Here you can see the incomes that are in the current budget period.

outcomesList.title: Expenses list
outcomesList.description: Here you can see the expenses that are in the current budget period.

goToGoalsPage.title: Go to goals page
goToGoalsPage.description: To discover the next features of the application, go to the goals page.

addGoal.title: Add new goal
addGoal.description: Add a new goal, select its name, amount you already have, amount you need, how often you want to save and until when you want to achieve this goal. After adding the goal, expenses on this goal will be automatically included in the budget.
addGoal.alert: You must add at least one goal, to continue

seeThisGoal.title: Goal card
seeThisGoal.description: This is the goal card, it contains information about the goal, its amount and progress. The highlighted button is used to view the savings schedule. You can edit the goal expense in this period if you saved more, or if you did not save the planned amount, future goal expenses will be automatically updated so that you can achieve the set goal.

editGoal.title: Goal edit
editGoal.description: You can also edit the goal, complete it, or delete it if you added it by mistake.

goToFortunePage.title: Go to fortune page
goToFortunePage.description: To discover the next features of the application, go to the fortune page.

addFirstAsset.title: Add new asset
addFirstAsset.description: Now add your first asset, it can be a house, cash, or stocks.
addFirstAsset.alert: You must add at least one asset, to continue

seeThisAsset.title: Asset card
seeThisAsset.description: This is the asset card, it contains information about the asset, its amount and progress. The highlighted button is used to view the asset history. You can edit the asset expense in this period if you saved more, or if you did not save the planned amount, future asset expenses will be automatically updated so that you can achieve the set goal.

addFirstDebt.title: Add new debt
addFirstDebt.description: Add your first debt, it can be a mortgage, or a loan.
addFirstDebt.alert: You must add at least one debt, to continue

seeThisDebt.title: Debt card
seeThisDebt.description: This is the debt card, you can edit and delete it, to do this use the highlighted buttons. You need to update the value of your assets and debts periodically to know exactly how much your net worth is at any given time.

seeAssetsCountCard.title: Assets card
seeAssetsCountCard.description: This is the assets card, it contains information about the value of all your assets.

seeDebtsCountCard.title: Debts card
seeDebtsCountCard.description: This is the debts card, it contains information about the value of all your debts.

seeNetWorthCard.title: Net worth card
seeNetWorthCard.description: This is the net worth card, it contains information about the value of your net worth.

financialCushionCard.title: Financial cushion card
financialCushionCard.description: This is the financial cushion card, it contains information about the value of your financial cushion.

livingAssetsCard.title: Living assets card
livingAssetsCard.description: This is the living assets card, it contains information about the value of your living assets.

investmentsCard.title: Investments card
investmentsCard.description: This is the investments card, it contains information about the value of your investments.

othersAssetsCard.title: Others assets card
othersAssetsCard.description: This is the others assets card, it contains information about the value of your others assets.

goToDashboardPage.title: Go to dashboard page
goToDashboardPage.description: To discover the next features of the application, go to the dashboard page.

dashboardFortuneCard.title: Fortune card
dashboardFortuneCard.description: Here you can see the summary of your fortune.

dashboardBudgetBalanceCard.title: Budget balance card
dashboardBudgetBalanceCard.description: Here you can see the current balance of your budget.

dashboardHistoryOfFinancesCard.title: History of finances card
dashboardHistoryOfFinancesCard.description: Here you can see the history of your finances on this and previous budget periods.

dashboardGoalsCard.title: Goals card
dashboardGoalsCard.description: Here you can see your goals and monitor their progress.

dashboardFinancialCushionCard.title: Financial cushion card
dashboardFinancialCushionCard.description: Here you can see the current level of your financial cushion, the application will show you if it is on a safe level compared to your expenses.
